intro: Ascend through serene skies, guiding a lone traveler across floating realms to discover a hopeful second chance.
description:
Rise above the clouds and follow a solitary traveler on a quest that blends graceful platforming with peaceful exploration. Each level is a dreamlike chapter of a larger tale about loss, resolve, and the hope of earning a second chance for humanity. Glide across floating islands, scale soaring structures, and navigate shifting gravity as friendly spirit guides share fragments of the story and teach you new abilities.
Designed for flow and mindfulness, the game favors clarity over frustration: precise jumps feel good, challenges are fair, and environmental puzzles fit naturally into the world. The painterly art direction and ethereal soundtrack turn every vista into a moment worth lingering on—without rushing you forward.
Features
•	Skybound 3D platforming with double jumps and directional dashes
•	Gentle environmental puzzles woven into exploration
•	Five distinct areas per level with evolving mechanics
•	Surreal, stylized worlds and sweeping, meditative vistas
•	Narrative fragments from helpful spirit guides
•	Accessible difficulty focused on flow, not punishment
